content: Pure nonsense from beginning to end. I kept hoping it would get better, but it never did.
Terrible plot and even worse acting.
I can't believe I sat through the whole thing. It was boring and confusing. The characters made no sense.
One of the worst movies I've ever seen. Completely predictable and painfully slow.
Boring, confusing, and just plain bad. I wish I had never heard of this movie.
Save yourself and skip this disaster. It's not even 'so bad it's good'.
Painful to watch from start to finish. The dialogue was cringey beyond belief.
Absolutely no redeeming qualities. The writing, directing, and acting were all bottom of the barrel.
How did this even get made? Someone needs to answer for this travesty.
Felt like a bad joke the whole time. Nothing made sense. I almost fell asleep halfway through.
Regret watching this more than anything. Honestly, it insulted my intelligence. Avoid at all costs.
An utter mess with zero direction. It's like they forgot to write a script. What a disaster.
Nothing about this was enjoyable. Even the soundtrack was annoying.
This movie actually made me angry. It had potential but somehow managed to ruin every good idea. Truly disappointing.
Complete trash. Would not recommend. Honestly, I'd rather watch paint dry.
Worse than I ever expected. I can't imagine anyone genuinely enjoying this.
A disaster in every way. Laughably bad effects and wooden performances. Please don't waste your money.
I'd give it zero stars if I could. Not even funny-bad, just bad. Stay far away.
Literally painful to sit through. Every moment dragged on forever.
Please don't waste your time on this. So many better things you could be doing. I regret every second.
